inclusion.criterion: Serum creatinine concentration of 1.8 mg/dl or more
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Urinary albumin to creatinine ratio >1000mg/g for patients without previous ACE inhibitor or ARB therapy
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Specific contraindications or history of hypersensitivity to the study drugs or other
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Serum potassium ≥ 6 mEq/L despite diuretic therapy, and optimized metabolic and acid/base control
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous history of allergy or intolerance, or evidence of immunologically-mediated renal disease, systemic diseases, cancer
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes and cardiomyopathy. He is being treated with ACE inhibitors and Beta blockers.
